summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Virginia Street, in the City of Seattle, from the East margin of Ninth Avenue to Denny Way, by paving the same with asphalt, laid upon a proper concrete foundation, and by constructing brick gutters, concrete curbs with granite corners, and by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, together with all water mains and sewers with their appurtenances necessary for the proper water service, fire protection and drainage of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 1018 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
